# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to exceptional standards. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will also bring significant benefits to you. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950000. I believe this offer presents a fantastic opportunity for both of us to create a mutually beneficial relationship. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
